nodes.name: project
nodes.description: Any specifically defined piece of work that is undertaken or attempted to meet a single requirement. (NCIt C47885)

properties.name: availability_mechanism
properties.description: Mechanism by which the project will be made avilable.

properties.name: availability_type
properties.description: Is the project open or restricted?

properties.name: code
properties.description: Unique identifier for the project.

properties.name: date_collected
properties.description: The date or date range in which the project data was collected.

properties.name: dbgap_accession_number
properties.description: The dbgap accession number provided for the project.

properties.name: intended_release_date
properties.description: Tracks a Project's intended release date.

properties.name: investigator_affiliation
properties.description: The investigator's affiliation with respect to a research institution.

properties.name: investigator_name
properties.description: Name of the principal investigator for the project.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Display name/brief description for the project.

properties.name: releasable
properties.description: A project can only be released by the user when `releasable` is true.

properties.name: released
properties.description: To release a project is to tell the GDC to include all submitted entities in the next GDC index.

properties.name: support_id
properties.description: The ID of the source providing support/grant resources.

properties.name: support_source
properties.description: The name of source providing support/grant resources.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'project' table.

nodes.name: acknowledgement
nodes.description: Acknowledgement of an individual involved in a project.

properties.name: acknowledgee
properties.description: The indvidiual or group being acknowledged by the project.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'project' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'acknowledgement' table.

properties.name: acknowledgement.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'acknowledgement' table.

properties.name: keyword_name
properties.description: The name of the keyword.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'project' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'keyword' table.

properties.name: keyword.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'keyword' table.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'project' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'publication' table.

properties.name: publication.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'publication' table.

nodes.name: radar
nodes.description: Describes a radar at a fixed site on the ground, mobile on a truck, or moveable.

properties.name: radar_id
properties.description: The identifier of the radar system.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'project' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'radar' table.

properties.name: radar.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'radar' table.

nodes.name: satellite
nodes.description: Describes a satellite which contains scientific instruments.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'project' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'satellite' table.

properties.name: satellite.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'satellite' table.

nodes.name: stream_gauge
nodes.description: Describes a stream gauge at a fixed site measuring height or discharge.

properties.name: action_flow
properties.description: The flow rate associated with the NWS action stage in cms.

properties.name: drainage_area
properties.description: The contributing drainage area of this stream gauge in square km.

properties.name: latitude
properties.description: The latitude of the stream gauge in decimal degrees.

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: The longitude of the stream gauge in decimal degrees.

properties.name: major_flow
properties.description: The flow rate associated with the NWS major flood stage in cms.

properties.name: minor_flow
properties.description: The flow rate associated with the NWS minor flood stage in cms.

properties.name: moderate_flow
properties.description: The flow rate associated with the NWS moderate flood stage in cms.

properties.name: nws_id
properties.description: The identifier assigned by the US NWS, if available.

properties.name: state_id
properties.description: The identifier assigned by the State or local authority, if available.

properties.name: usgs_id
properties.description: The identifier assigned by the USGS, if available.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'project' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'stream_gauge' table.

properties.name: stream_gauge.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'stream_gauge' table.

nodes.name: weather_station
nodes.description: Describes a weather station at a fixed site. Weather stations typically measure temperature, humidity, and precipitation.

properties.name: elevation
properties.description: The elevation of the weather station in meters.

properties.name: icao_id
properties.description: The identifier of the weather station.

properties.name: latitude
properties.description: The latitude of the weather station in decimal degrees.

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: The longitude of the weather station in decimal degrees.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'project' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'weather_station' table.

properties.name: weather_station.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'weather_station' table.

properties.name: satellite.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'satellite' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'geo_orbit' table.

properties.name: geo_orbit.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'geo_orbit' table.

properties.name: apogee_altitude
properties.description: The height of the apogee of the orbit in meters.

properties.name: inclination
properties.description: The orbital inclination in degrees.

properties.name: perigee_altitude
properties.description: The height of the perigee of the orbit in meters.

properties.name: satellite.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'satellite' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'leo_orbit' table.

properties.name: leo_orbit.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'leo_orbit' table.

nodes.name: passive_instrument
nodes.description: A passive instrument aboad a satellite receiving at a specific wavelength.

properties.name: band_name
properties.description: The nickname used for the instrument band.

properties.name: central_wavelength
properties.description: The central wavelength the instrument receives data at in micrometers.

properties.name: instrument_name
properties.description: The name of the instrument on the satellite which is recording data.

properties.name: resolution
properties.description: The spatial resolution of the band in meters.

properties.name: satellite.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'satellite' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'passive_instrument' table.

properties.name: passive_instrument.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'passive_instrument' table.

properties.name: data_category
properties.description: Broad categorization of the contents of the data file.

properties.name: data_format
properties.description: Format of the data files.

properties.name: data_type
properties.description: Specific content type of the data file.

properties.name: file_name
properties.description: The name (or part of a name) of a file (of any type).

properties.name: file_size
properties.description: The size of the data file (object) in bytes.

properties.name: md5sum
properties.description: The 128-bit hash value expressed as a 32 digit hexadecimal number used as a file's digital fingerprint.

properties.name: object_id
properties.description: The GUID of the object in the index service.

properties.name: publication.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'publication' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'publication_file' table.

properties.name: publication_file.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'publication_file' table.

nodes.name: radar_location
nodes.description: A latitude, longitude, and elevation for where the radar was located when it was operating.

properties.name: elevation
properties.description: The elevation of the site of the radar in meters.

properties.name: latitude
properties.description: The latitude of the radar in decimal degrees.

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: The longitude of the radar in decimal degrees.

properties.name: tower_height
properties.description: The height of the radar above ground level in meters.

properties.name: radar.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'radar' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'radar_location' table.

properties.name: radar_location.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'radar_location' table.

nodes.name: volume_coverage_pattern
nodes.description: The volume coverage pattern when data was collected by the radar system.

properties.name: vcp_number
properties.description: The volume coverage pattern when the radar collected this dataset.

properties.name: radar.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'radar' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'volume_coverage_pattern' table.

properties.name: volume_coverage_pattern.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'volume_coverage_pattern' table.

nodes.name: derived_scene
nodes.description: Describes a scene derived from potentially multiple satellite instruments.

properties.name: desciption
properties.description: A description of the derived scene.

properties.name: passive_instrument.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'passive_instrument' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'derived_scene' table.

properties.name: derived_scene.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'derived_scene' table.

nodes.name: spatiotemporal_file
nodes.description: A file with data also containing a timestamp and geographical bounding box.

properties.name: bounding_box_east
properties.description: The eastern most longitude in decimal degrees.

properties.name: bounding_box_north
properties.description: The northern latitude in decimal degrees.

properties.name: bounding_box_south
properties.description: The southern latitude in decimal degrees.

properties.name: bounding_box_west
properties.description: The western most longitude in decimal degrees.

properties.name: data_category
properties.description: Broad categorization of the contents of the data file.

properties.name: data_format
properties.description: Format of the data files.

properties.name: data_type
properties.description: Specific content type of the data file.

properties.name: datetime
properties.description: A combination of date and time of day in the form [-]CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss[Z|(+|-)hh:mm]

properties.name: file_name
properties.description: The name (or part of a name) of a file (of any type).

properties.name: file_size
properties.description: The size of the data file (object) in bytes.

properties.name: md5sum
properties.description: The 128-bit hash value expressed as a 32 digit hexadecimal number used as a file's digital fingerprint.

properties.name: object_id
properties.description: The GUID of the object in the index service.

properties.name: passive_instrument.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'passive_instrument' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'spatiotemporal_file' table.

properties.name: geo_orbit.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'geo_orbit' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'spatiotemporal_file' table.

properties.name: leo_orbit.id

properties.name: derived_scene.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'derived_scene' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'spatiotemporal_file' table.

properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'volume_coverage_pattern' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'spatiotemporal_file' table.

properties.name: radar_location.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'radar_location' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'spatiotemporal_file' table.

properties.name: stream_gauge.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'stream_gauge' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'spatiotemporal_file' table.
